#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()


inline void read(int &x){
        x=0;
        register char c=gc();
        for(;c<'0' || c>'9';c=gc());
         for(;c>='0' && c<='9';c=gc())
          x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+(c-'0');
      }
inline void write(long long int x){
 
         register char buffor[35];
         register int i=0;
         do{
               buffor[i++]=(x%10)+'0';
               x/=10;
            } while(x);
           i--;
            while(i>=0) putchar_unlocked(buffor[i--]);
            putchar_unlocked('\n');
       }
       

int main() {
    int n,m,i,j,max=0,min=1000000000,num;
    read(m);
    read(n);
    for(i=0;i<m;i++){
        min=1000000000;
        for(j=0;j<n;j++){
            read(num);
            min  = num < min ? num : min;
        }
        max = min > max ? min : max;
    }
    write(max);
	return 0;
}
